name: Realistic Flappy Bird
description:
Hey folks!

I hope you enjoy my first game in Unreal. I would greatly appreciate opinions. If I see that the game has some downloads I will keep updating it!

How to play:

Use the left mouse click or the space bar to jump in Windows. On Android tap on the screen to jump. Dodge the obstacles passing through the gap between them. The speed of the obstacles will increase progressively.
